name: Infinite Word Loop (Neurodiversity Game Jam Version)
name_original: Infinite Word Loop (Neurodiversity Game Jam Version)
description:
I literally don't know what i'm doing, so sorry in advance.

I wanted to  make something in time for this Game Jam since it mattered to me, so sorry if this feels a little bit rushed, still, if you fell like it, criticism is very much welcomed, especially since this is my first time doing anything of this sort. :)

I would tell more about the game, but i think that ruins part of the game. All you need to know is that it's a text based fantasy "adventure" game made for Twine 2.

Also, if I did everything right, this game should be compatible with OpenDyslexic.
